violations.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds

nodes.html: <input size="40" placeholder="Search all of AmtrakOIG.gov" data-drupal-selector="edit-search-key" type="text" id="edit-search-key" name="search_key" maxlength="128" class="form-text">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 4.29 (foreground color: #c3c7cb, background color: #455967, font size: 11.3pt (15px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1
